doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Israt Hasan
doctor.specialty: Arthritis, Paralysis, Rheumatological Diseases, Injury & Rehabilitation Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Israt Hasan is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Physical Medicine). He is a Consultant Physiatrist, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at D Lab Medical Services, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Israt Hasan at D Lab Medical Services, Barisal is 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
